description: Some 47 people at Abbotswood Nursing Home in Ballasalla have now tested positive for Covid-19.
title: Coronavirus Isle of Man: 13th death confirmed at care home
title_page: Coronavirus Isle of Man: 13th death confirmed at care home - BBC News
maintext: The Department of Health and Social Care stepped in to run Abbotswood on 13 April amid safety concerns and the care provider's licence has been suspended.
